result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher Robert Rosenberg was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "B"], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant to meet with the payment clerk.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher Robert Rosenberg

DE called to request a 1 mo deferment of his Pplan.  DE was advised that he only has 1 pymt of $30.70 left, but DE stated he would still need the deferment.  DE to submit request by 4:30 pm on 9-02-16. jaf
From DE on 8-29-16 stating he is unemployed & unable to make his late Aug pymt.  Ret'd call to DE to the number he stated in his v/m & left a msg for him to return my call. jaf
from Defendant stating he cannot make his payment this month he has lost his job. He will leave me a message for Jayme. eif

From DE requesting deferment of Pplan.  Ret'd call to DE & advised him to have a letter faxed, mailed, or dropped off by 11-30-15.  DE would like pymts lowered & Nov pymt deferred - DE stated he would put his letter in the mail. Includes 03CM826, 13CM498, 15CM527. jaf

DE appeared.  DE adding 15CM527 to Pplan on 13CM498.  DE to pay $100/mo comm 11-27-15.  $15 PPF added.  DE signed PPA.  Includes 03CM826, 13CM498, 15CM527. jaf

CO: Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Minot,ADA:  Matthew L Hartung   DF ATTY:  Joseph R. Caton   DF:  Christopher Robert Rosenberg appeared. Case called at 2:33 pm. There is an agreement. Atty Caton recites agreement. No objection from Atty Caton. Court dismisses repeater and domestic abuse enhancer. Court reviews constitutional rights with Def. Court finds def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights. Court reads charge and possible penalties for amended count one, Def pleads Guilty. Court uses complaints and reports as factual basis, accepts plea and adjudicates Def guilty of amended count one. Court orders: 
- Court Costs $114.50
- DNA Surcharge: $200.00
Payable on payment plan.
Filed by ADA Correll. km
Filed by Atty Caton. km
Appointing Atty Caton. km

ADDRESS INFO for Christopher Robert Rosenberg
Current: 1742 Ponderosa Lane, New Richmond, WI 54017 United States  (Effective: 09-03-2015)
Prior: 116 W. 3rd Street, Lowery Hotel, New Richmond, WI 54017 
per Defendant - worked it out w/his mother. eif
Pre-trial conference at 10-29-2015 02:00 pm

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Jamie R.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.
